originalText.text: As soon as you walk in you can see in the staffs face they don't want to work, the unprofessionalism, the careless cold and unconcerned work ethic. So sad! No one takes pride at work anymore. So sad! With that being said the doctor with his staff in the back did a good thorough job.

originalText.text: I have great confidence in Dr. Cotliar's professional expertise! It was so nice to see him once again. He is very compassionate and extremely knowledgeable. I always feel that I am receiving excellent care at his office!

originalText.text: Very nice clean and sanitized. My first time and I was so welcome staffs are so kind and pleasant. Dr Cotlair is so nice and gentle. Awaiting for my upcoming Cataract surgery and I'm feeling confidentiality that every things going to be alright and satisfactory.

originalText.text:
I was completely satisfied with the quality of guidance and care that I received by Dr. Cotliar and his staff of professionals.  The medical procedures that were required was complex in nature but I was fully informed about what had to be done and the way it was going to be done.
I'm sure anyone who decides to entrust their confidence in Dr. Cotliar they will not be disappointed.  Thank you for giving me the opportunity to contribute to the discussion.

Kind Regards,  A Completely Satisfied Customer

With Dr Cotliar and his team, expect lots of preparation and information gathering as part of every appointment.

As his  patient, I feel very comfortable that years of skill and science are behind every decision and recommendation.
